website_summaries.verdict: A great rescue bag option with a longer cord than most other competitors.
pros: Bag comes with 70 feet of highly visible rope for extended length
The inside lining features a foam insert to keep the bag afloat during rough weather
cons: Handle placement on the bag is awkward for accurate distance throws

customer_reviews.title: Piece of mind and value
customer_reviews.text: Nice addition to our boat. With younger kids, you never know when something might happen and having this extra safety item available provides piece of mind. This item is almost 50% less money than what you get at Bass Pro/ Cabelas, and is about 25 feet longer than what they typically sell.
customer_reviews.author: Aaron

customer_reviews.title: As advertised
customer_reviews.text: Decent bag and rope, would have liked a carabiner holding the rope in the bag instead of just tying a knot through the bottom of the bag because it prevents the bag from standing upright.
customer_reviews.author: Fish-n-Weld

customer_reviews.title: Excellent quality
customer_reviews.text: I like these as well as the more expensive brand. I have used them as well.
customer_reviews.author: KS

customer_reviews.title: Bad design. Quality looked good
customer_reviews.text: Handle is sewn to the side of the bag instead of the end of the bag which decreases the accuracy and distance of the throw. Bad design. Quality looked good, but if it can't reach the victim what good is it?
customer_reviews.author: Denise M Rose

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Throws well and packs up well. It does the job for a reasonable price.
customer_reviews.author: Jason C

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: This is very useful as I do go kayaking on a regulars basis.
customer_reviews.author: learn

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Tested in the field on the upper Deschutes. Successful throws and recovery.
customer_reviews.author: Jason Hattery

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: You can't beat the price for the rope and the rope bag! Great product
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Really good product
customer_reviews.text: This product is good thing to have for the river
customer_reviews.author: jeff Schwegler

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Haven't had to use it yet...but worked well demoing in the yard
customer_reviews.author: Walkers

customer_reviews.title: Good and well priced
customer_reviews.text: Good and well priced throw rope. I use it for Whitewater kayaking.
customer_reviews.author: Jake

customer_reviews.title: I got this fast and in great condition. I bought this for water rescue with ...
customer_reviews.text: I got this fast and in great condition. I bought this for water rescue with my fire department light attaches to my harness small compact and perfect for rescue.
customer_reviews.author: Deamontora

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: had to use them a couple times and they worked perfectly
customer_reviews.author: machthree

customer_reviews.title: good little bag
customer_reviews.text: Your basic,economical throw bag. Great to keep in the car,boat, or wherever theres water nearby. No complaints-can't beat the price.
customer_reviews.author: paulyray

customer_reviews.title: Work great, no complaints
customer_reviews.text: I'm a camp director and bought them for our trips. Work great, no complaints.
customer_reviews.author: Brendan

product_meta.title: Liberty Mountain Boater's Throw Bag (70-Feet)
product_meta.description: The Dirty Devil Boater's Throw Bags contain 70' of rope and features a side release buckle for secure attachment and rapid release! Made of 420 D packcloth and 1000 D reinforcement material, these throw bags also have drawstring and cordlock closures.With a foam insert assuring the bag remains afloat, the Dirty Devil Boater's Throw Bags also contain 7mm of polypropylene float rope. 1600 lb strength.
feature_bullets: 50' rope in Kayaker's, 70' rope in Boater's and Deluxe.
Foam insert assures the bag remains afloat.
Made of 420 D packcloth and 1000 D reinforcement.

specifications.Domestic Shipping: Currently, item can be shipped only within the U.S. and to APO/FPO addresses. For APO/FPO shipments, please check with the manufacturer regarding warranty and support issues.
specifications.International Shipping: This item can be shipped to select countries outside of the U.S.
